Yes, I know this has been discussed before, but from what I've found 
of the solutions none seem to work for me. I've tried editing my 
junit/runner/excluded.properties file, such that i have this: 
excluded.2=org.*  I also read that I should put 
excluded.6=org.w3c.dom.* and excluded.7=org.xml.sax.* in there, but 
it was already there.  I've looked through the old messages but 
nothing seems to help.  What else should I look at?

Here is the error:
